website_summaries.verdict: This three-pack mellows nervous dogs for up to 90 days — a great value.
pros: The three collars are individually wrapped to preserve the pheromone potency until ready for use
cons: The lavender and chamomile scent may be too fragrant for some owners
At 23 inches, this is the shortest collar we tested

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great And Seems To Help
customer_reviews.text: We desperately needed to find something to help our foster dog with his separation anxiety. He absolutely hates when we leave and barks and barks in his crate. I decided to order a pack of these collars to try. They seem to make him feel a little more calm and they smell great! I was really impressed that they seemed to make a difference. They are the perfect size for the dog, a 70lb. Labrador, and I didn't need to cut it down at all, as to leave it loose for easier removal. Would definitely recommend these to anyone with a nervous/anxious dog as something to try.
customer_reviews.author: Terrier MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love IT!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well!! My doberman was very very anxious and with the collar he is more relax and seems very better. The collar last about 3-4 weeks. Then i change it and i see the change after one night!! It's wonderful for us!! We love it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tatie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My little dog is absolutely phobic when it comes to fireworks. I asked the vet for a tranquilizer and when I read up on it I decided not to give it to my dog. A friend told me about DAP and so I decided to try it. It calmed her considerably. She was still frightened, but not urinating on herself. We recently bought a new car and the dog whines constantly because she has to ride on the backseat by herself. We put a collar on her and she just curled up in her bed and went to sleep. DAP may not be effective for all dogs, but it works well for ours. The price here cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Judi B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I went with this set of collars for my 2 dogs. They had a very nice aroma, which I am most positive was more for the human than the dog. In the reviews and the sellers notes it says could take a few days to a few weeks. I left it on both my dogs, even changed it out on one of my dogs. I did not notice any change at all. Now one of my dogs when I first adopted he had a DAP collar and he was so sweet and calm. those actually work, I should have spent the extra money on that.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Poor thing was so uncomfortable I had to remove it ...
customer_reviews.text: This "calming" collar did nothing to alleviate my dog's separation anxiety. Instead, all it did was turn her into an itchy mess. Poor thing was so uncomfortable I had to remove it after 24 hours. It definitely made my whole house smell, which I would have been fine with if it had actually worked. I'm returning the item and wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Part of a solution, not all of one.
customer_reviews.text: This worked for us, for a VERY specific purpose -- fear of other dogs/territorialism. It has in no way cut down on separation anxiety, or the need to be glued to my leg, but it has been a big part in finally convincing my lady dog that maybe she can be friends with other dogs. She is not nippy, or fearful the way she was. She even happily greeted a neighbor's dog for the first time, ever-ever. For people whole are struggling with fear aggression in public, this might be the tool that finally gets you in the right direction. It won't do all the work, but it sure helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: These are like miracle workers. We have 2 females who wanted to fight all the time (trying to establish alpha status). We had gotten bitten a couple of times (doing exactly what you're NOT supposed to). Since putting these on them, there have been no more serious fights, only 2 very minor scuffles. I would recommend these for anyone who is having dominance issues.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hoth

customer_reviews.title: this collar has been a God send!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I was very skeptical but was desperate to fund something to help our "adopted" grandog. When we got him from our daughter her shook constantly, chewed himself relentlessly & cryed every time my husband or I left the room. After three wks the shaking has stopped, he still chews a bit , but animal now in my opinion. Best if all we can leave the room, the house & go to bed in peace, no more crying!! This color has been a God send, I really can't stop praising this product enough!
customer_reviews.author: anitaj

customer_reviews.title: Very heavily scented
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended this brand, it is a heavy scent. you will smell it. I didn't notice a difference but we adopted our 4 yr old German Shepherd and learned his anxiety was being inside and he wanted to be outside running and riding in the truck cab. So I can't really say I noticed a difference with this collar. But my daughter has used these and it made a difference with her cats and dogs. It is expensive IMO but maybe for a large dog like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Awful Scent
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our rescue pup on the advice of our trainer. She mentioned it had a lavender scent. I was expecting a fresh lavender scent but what we got instead was ladies deodorant circa 1985. The scent is AWFUL. Maybe I ordered the wrong one? When I took it out of the package, some of the coating was flaking off onto the floor, and more came off on my pup when I put it on. I haven’t noticed a difference yet - granted it’s been less than a day. I think I’ll give it another day then chuck it. If it was making a noticeable difference, I’d just try and deal with the scent.
customer_reviews.author: SensoryMama

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First off, you have to cut the flash off (plastic nubs). They're too pointy for your dogs neck. The scent is so overbearing, I at least took it off at night but the smell was in his fur. He had a restless night. That should sum up its effectiveness. Didn't mellow my border collie/ Shar pei mixed pooch down a single bit. Notable is the fact that I couple it with "composure" treats which I'll be reviewing next, also with a poor review.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since the price was better than the Adaptil collars and I liked the color. This smelled like fake laundry perfume chemicals. I thought it might dissipate but it didn't. The smell gave me a headache so I had to take it off of my dog. I ended up bathing him a couple of days later to get the smell off of his neck - it was that strong. The pheromones don't have a scent noticeable to humans, so i don't know why the Sentry products smell so offensive.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: The best product yet for our Goldie.
customer_reviews.text: Our golden retriever has separation anxiety and we have tried everything to help decrease it with no luck until now. We use these collars monthly and we can tell when it needs to be change because the panting, drooling, whining, and pacing starts again when we leave the house. It's hard to watch but has been remarkably better with these collars. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't wait for me to put these on her
customer_reviews.text: Our little Pomeranian is 14 years old, and she had developed separation anxiety in her old age. I originally bought the DAP collar, which works very well, but it was rather expensive for only lasting a month. I bought these, hoping they would work as well as the DAP collar did. I'm happy to report that they seem to work just as well, and they're much more cost-effective. She loves these collars. When one loses its effectiveness, I get out another one, and she's right there nudging me trying to get me to put it on her. As an added bonus, these have a nice scent--kind of like lotion--so they smell good to me too.
customer_reviews.author: Elbie

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my Sinuses.  Something Flaking Off.
customer_reviews.text: Tons of whitish flakes coming off the collar immediately upon removing it from the bag. Doesn’t seem right to me. I don’t know if it’s the pheromones, the essential oils or all of the above. Regardless, I’m returning it because it has caused my sinuses to burn. I won’t put this on my dogs. Another reviewer said she thinks the flakes coming off her collar inflamed her dogs eyes requiring a trip to the vet & medication for many months. How can this be a safe product? I don’t think it is. I hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help our dog's anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: We used this product on 2 of our pug-mix dogs (one being VERY anxious). I do not feel as though the collar changed the behavior of the anxious dog.... BUT I do feel that our mild-tempered other dog did seem a bit more relaxed (less barking, more sleeping). Because the product was purchased with the anxious dog in mind, I don't feel that they worked for us, although the odor was pleasant & the collars are adjustable in size and flexible. Both dogs have worn these collars for 2 weeks before writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: ct112

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Our Dog from Shaking and More!!!
customer_reviews.text: My parents dog was constantly shaking for no reason, barely eating, and he wouldn't leave the bedroom for anything. I bought the collar for him to try, even though I really didn't have much hope of it helping because of his extreme symptoms, but after using the collar for just a couple of days he had completely stopped shaking and was eating normally. Just a short while after that he started to come out of the bedroom and was following my mom all around the house just like their other dog did. This collar completely changed, and possibly even saved their dog's life. Thank you so much for your amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Cutie Pie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: really surprised, these work and it is instant. I have a 11 yr old yorkie and he was born high strung. with lots of anxiety. he is much more relaxed now and more relaxed around other people too. I a waiting to see if his anxiety is better when I am gone for a few hours, anxiety like marking the furniture. that is the next test. if I am able will post another review and let everyone know
customer_reviews.author: maryann b rhyne

customer_reviews.title: Incresed price has stopped purchases
customer_reviews.text: This collar worked very well with several of our rescue dogs who were not doing well in the kennel. It made such a difference that several were adopted. Behavior change was almost immediate. We were buying them regularly to replace monthly. Now that the price has doubled we can no longer afford them. Note: They did not work on all dogs. As with most things you have to have several options from which to choose. Unfortunately this collar is no longer an option for our rescue.
customer_reviews.author: C. BROOKS

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable results
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to try on our 10 week old puppy. We are getting ready to take a trip and want to take him with us and take him on the plane. We tried it out on a car ride and could not believe the results. He stopped barking and whining within about three minutes of putting the collar on and became very relaxed and was comfortable. We had no issues whatsoever on the plane it worked great . Can also be used if your dog is out of control as many puppies can be. It will take them from a level 10 to a level five dog very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Opened package and not the same package that is in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived with 2 other items. The box was fine. When I took this package out it looked like something someone returned. It does not come in a box like the ones I buy in the store and that is pictured. It comes in a can. It has a clear hard plastic wrapper. The pkg was cut open and the top trimmed off. It had clearly been opened. I am not sure if the product had been tampered with. I am not comfortable putting this on my dog if someone had either returned it or did something to it. Very disappointed. I am going to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bigwez

customer_reviews.title: works but stinks
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but I am allergic to it's fragrance which is strong to me. Otherwise, it does what it is supposed to do. My adopted pup - she was 7 mo old when we got her - pees on any bed or blanket she lays on. She learned to lay in her bedding after peeing on it because the people we rescued her from kept her locked up in a cage in the basement. She is EXTREMELY timid/fearful of the slightest sense of a raised voice or tone change also and will piddle. She was afraid of loud noises also. Since wearing it, she has not yet peed on anything and is more calm.
customer_reviews.author: KayCisko

customer_reviews.title: Collar is very stiff, cut into doggo's skin
customer_reviews.text: I got this collar to help my tiny new rescue chihuahua to adapt to his new home. He had a bad case of kennel cough when we got him so he was pretty traumatized all around. I think the collar did help but unfortunately I had to take it off before it stopped being effective because the ridges are really hard and stiff and they would rub into his skin, even if the collar wasn't tight. The collar itself is very stiff, if they made a small dog version that would be soft and pliable I'd use these again in a heartbeat. It's really too bad.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeLemonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I think these might actually work...
customer_reviews.text: I’m not 100% sure, but I think that these actually work. My bichon has the most annoying “silent whine” when he’s nervous or anxious, which is pretty much whenever I’m not paying attention to him every second of the day. That stopped after about two days of wearing this collar. And best of all, he stopped marking in the house. I was skeptical when I bought these, but they’re definitely not the worst money that I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: momof3dogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: is easy enough to put on but the waxy material does ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the recommendation of our trainer to try for our rescue dog that has some anxiety. It smells pleasant, is easy enough to put on but the waxy material does flake a little and it was plenty long. However, it did absolutely nothing for our dog. Thankful I got it on amazon for half the price of the local store but this ended up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: chem

customer_reviews.title: I do believe this may work for others.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in Nov. 2016, for our lab/retriever/pit bull mix, who is a rescue dog. I really did not see much of a difference in her behavior, she still is extremely overactive with an enormous amount of energy. She has gone through training, puppy, intermediate and advanced which has helped, I had hoped the collars would calm her a little, however it may be her breed mix, as well as how she was treated prior to her rescue and she is still a pup at a year and half. I hope this works for others.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for my pet
customer_reviews.text: This collar didn't help with my dog's anxious behavior at all. In fact, her anxiety seemed to increase after we put the collar on her. However, this might be because she has moderate to severe separation anxiety; others might have better results. Also, it has a noticeable scent to humans. It isn't a bad scent, but it's flowery and strong enough that it made me sneeze when my dog was on the couch next to me. She also scratched at it a lot, so I think it made her itch. It might work for some, but it did not work for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help our marking probem
customer_reviews.text: We tried the Sentry calming collar on our 2 male Dachsunds for 2 weeks without any noticeable change in marking behavior. What has seemed to help is an herbal diet supplement our vet recommended called Happy Wanderer by Kan Essentials. They have been taking these for 2 weeks now and so far the marking in the house has stopped. We have also closed bedroom doors when not in use so they have less area with unsupervised access. We have a pet door so they can out whenever they like and pee to their heart's content
customer_reviews.author: Steven Baker

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our dog, she can relax again
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was very anxious when we brought our baby home from the hospital. Her protective instincts kicked into high gear and it seemed like she could never relax. We have used pheromone collars kn our cats for years with good results so we decided to try these. These collars definitely help her to relax and just hours after putting it on we saw her lay down all sprawled out and comfortable. Much like the pheromone collars for cats, these probably won't work for every dog, but if you have e a dog that is anxious or generally high strung it is worth trying these. Lastly, the price on Amazon is far better than the price in any pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Smell
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the another brand for quite a while and thought I would give this collar a try. Both work on the same concept of pheromone technology (?) but this collar smells like a Glade Plug In and I wasn't accustomed to her calming collar having a smell at all much less such a strong smell. Very strong odor and after a few days I took it off my little girl. I was concerned the chemicals or ingredients would or could cause some irritation. She already has skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Works great at stopping marking.
customer_reviews.text: They work great on my Yorkie. He really had quit marking the edge of things (chairs, boxes, anything else with anything even resembling a corner). It has not calmed him down in any other way or changed who he is, which was exactly what we were going for. We've used these for over a year and will for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Snellgrovia

customer_reviews.title: As good as the name brand collars.
customer_reviews.text: This worked just as good as the name brand collars we had bought before for our Yorkie. The only thing I didn't like was it has a very strong perfume type Oder. But the good this did for our dog, and the money we saved, out weighed tolerating the smell, which is only noticeable when we snuggled him. We bought these collars to help with marking in the house. Our dogs have a doggie door and can go outside when ever they want, but our Yorkie even fixed has always marked. The marking nearly completely stopped while wearing this collar. Just be sure to mark your calendar to change it every four weeks.
customer_reviews.author: SallySueInPa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have a beagle mix and she barks at everything! I thought this would help her calm down a little but it did nothing but make her itch. She hated it and the smell is super strong. We ended up going with a sonic collar that makes a noise when she barks, that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kline

customer_reviews.title: Love these collars, but need to know how to use them properly.
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for my dogs, whom are quite timid, and at times aggressive because of fear. They use these when walking, and training, to get them socialized while being a little more calm during the process. This isn't a quick fix and won't fix behavior issues on it's own... but it is a great tool to put your dog at ease while moving forward with training. I wouldn't expect a hyper active dog, that doesn't get walked often, to just calm down and all of the sudden start to behave! Great product, when used correctly, or a quick fix to introduce your pup to a new situation with less stress.
customer_reviews.author: Thumper77

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I wish it was not this expensive due to needing one each month, I have to say that this product has helped my dog since he was a puppy. The time he went without it, he ripped the carpet of the living room due to separation anxiety. Therefore, it does that job if changed every month, and it makes him smell wonderful. Many people asked me how I make my dog smell so goo. Well, it’s the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Constancio

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old standard poodle. She's a worry standoffish type of creature. She's super goofy, fun, loving, and smart behind closed doors. However, someone new comes over or we go out and about she is a stressed, worried, on edge dog. I did notice a difference using the collar. I used for 30 days. I actually like the smell. This is a well made collar, that you can size. She didn't completely change, but I do feel this has helped her relax a little. And that is worth it. The smell also will last the full 30 days. I will continue to buy this because anything to relax my dear love is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieS

customer_reviews.title: My dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend: I tried using these for my dog with separation anxiety and it didn’t do much. He continuously itched his neck while he had it on, which he does not do with a regular collar. It did not make him act any calmer either. We haven’t continued trying to use them due to the itching.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A sixpack of furry little dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a full pack of 3 purebred Pekingese and 3 Pekapoms, I bought these collars to try to calm them when visitors come a calling. Really all in all I'd say these collars do work to help calm the pack, they don't work to stop behaviors that proper training would take care of (I have 2 puppies in this mix so the training difference is noticeable). My disappointment was that they didn't work as long as I had expected or hoped, after about one week the collars seemed to have no effect at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: jfab

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I feel my dog's anxiety is to high for this collar. I am very likely going to try and put two on him at one time to see if that does anything because it has been weeks and nothing has changed He is a big dog a Lab Pit Bull Mix so perhaps he is too large for this to work? Either way 3 pack for the money is a good deal and Im sure this works on other dogs, it just did not work on mine,
customer_reviews.author: Westley Morris

customer_reviews.title: I CAN'T BELIEVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I a Pithuahua - Pit Bull/Chihuahua mix that is the loudest, most active dog I have EVERRR seen - not simply owned. He's 7 months old and has been trying my patience since I had him. He's so smart and sweet, but have considered throwing him out with the trash at least once a week. Seriously, this collar has calmed him down considerably. I found out about it when doing research looking for options beside the pound. We noticed within the first hour how calm he was. I think I'll grab a subscription for these.
customer_reviews.author: Boss Baby

customer_reviews.title: My dog was out of control with fireworks at new years last year so this year I tried this collar and it was amazing what a difference it made
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how well this collar works!!! My dog was out of control with fireworks at new years last year so this year I tried this collar and it was amazing what a difference it made. My dog was so much calmer and under control after only a few minutes of wearing it. It also works good for flying her from Hawaii to Seattle. She flew in a carrier under my seat and slept most of the way. GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J.

customer_reviews.title: They smell great as well
customer_reviews.text: My dog randomly started being scared of EVERYTHING. And by everything I mean, when I carried in a pizza she flipped her lid and went running. We put one of these on her and almost instantly she was way calmer and was not as scared! They smell great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The only product I use by Sentry.
customer_reviews.text: I used to work at Animal Control and we used these for the new dogs who were stressed. I always joked they had a magical lucky charm in them because the dogs we put them on always got adopted. That’s just probably coincidence but anyway. They do a really good job at mellowing out dogs who are stressed and scared. I usually do not like this brand, but for calming collars they’re my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these collars for our crazy sensitive dog. She claims they help the dog stay calm. I notice the day I put them on she does seem a bit more relaxed, the dog, not my wife. I doubt the calming really lasts the whole month but for a few bucks they are sort of stylish and if they help at all, I will take any good results.
customer_reviews.author: the waterboy

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well for our dog!
customer_reviews.text: Guys, this is NOT a cure all for every dog on the planet! The very best thing to do is order one, see if it works for your dog. I have a 14 year old bichon-poo that is very sensitive to certain noises. She is also starting to nip at our other dogs. After about a week wearing this collar, she started to be less sensitive to those noises. Unfortunately it did nothing for the nipping. Not helping with the nipping does not make this a bad product. It simply does not help for my pet. The relief of the tension caused from loud noises was well worth trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Soundaround

customer_reviews.title: Works well - would recommend for times of stressful changes
customer_reviews.text: On the advice of my service dog's trainer I got these when I was going through a stressful period and was having surgery. He was going to be in an usual environment of being in the hospital with me for several days. As some dog owner may know our dogs can easily pick up on our stress. This calming collar puts off the hormones a dogs mother puts off when they are puppies. This makes unusual situations easier. I j Have since used it at other difficult times such as my father's death and it works well. My service dog is still able to focus on me and what I need but the unusual situations don't seem to bother him.
customer_reviews.author: TRP

customer_reviews.title: Did Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8-year-old male pug who demonstrates anxiety symptoms (shaking with loud noises, frequently marking his territory, and constantly needing to be near us). His vet recommended either this collar, spray, or plug in. These collars did absolutely nothing. Definitely a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescued dog. She tends to be a bit anxious. She is very sweet, yet destructive. We can always tell when it is time to change the collar because she will chew children's toys when we leave the house. She is much more mellow and less on edge! I swear by these collars! Just put one on my yellow lab for the first time to see if it helps with her nawing on her paws. 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: We think it helps with agression.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a corgi that tends to be dog agressive. I had tried the more expensive ones and noted that they have a higher % of the hormone that is supposed to be calming, but these cheaper ones seem to work just as well. The dog is still not totally chill, but we think she's a little better with the collar. One nice thing about these collars, as opposed to the more expensive ADAPTIL collar, is that this one has a nice lavender sent that stays around for at least a couple of weeks. You may not like that if you don't like lavender.
customer_reviews.author: BGN

customer_reviews.title: A strong ODOR
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this really works. I didn't see a change in my dogs. I placed the the collar on them days prior to July 4th. I wanted to unplug the home scent defuser since these collars are strong. I don't think I'll purchase them again. I'll continue to search for other ways to keep them calm during July 4th and New Year's.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tell if it works, so maybe it doesn’t?
customer_reviews.text: Kind worked? It’s hard to tell. My chihuahua hates car rides with a passion. He hyperventilates for hours and jumps around the car, and freaks out if you try to leash him up or kennel him. I got this along with some pheromone spray for a 3 day 28 hour road trip. He freaked out most of the first day but the second day did great. Unsure if it was the collar or he just got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Bertels

customer_reviews.title: Too strong of scent!!
customer_reviews.text: It MAY work but I couldn't keep it on my dog long enough to find out because I couldn't stand how strongly this smelled of perfume! It's a very very strong scent and my dog's hair smelled like it for forever as well. If you are sensitive to strong perfumes/smells, don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Well I tried and....... it worked
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to give it a shot but I did not buy the 3 pack I only bought one. My 5.5 year old pit mix all of a sudden started having anxiety attacks at night and I couldn't sleep for a few hours. Her blood work was normal. So someone recommended the plug in but I tried the collar instead. It's like a new dog and for the past week she has been calm and I can sleep. I noticed an immediate change....as soon as I put it on
customer_reviews.author: LoriPittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: From thriller, to chiller!
customer_reviews.text: My Red Bone Coon Hound has some pretty serious anxiety. I found this product initially in stores, but am so glad to be able to order 3 at a time! He is far more chill now wearing the collar, and things that used to set him off, really don't bother him anymore! The collar smells nice and that makes it that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Tranquilizer for my baby at last...
customer_reviews.text: Peaceful pitbull at last! It's taken me years of throwing good money down the drain to finally find a product to calm my crazy baby. Theses collars have reduced her anxiety better than Valium, lol! She even sleeps soundly through stroms which she used to spend in under the table or bed trembling terribly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We tried these for our new puppy who is a little shy. We almost immediately noticed a decrease in her skittishness. After about a month the scent begins to diminish and we noticed an increase in her skittishness again. We threw it away after the scent was gone and this was right before her first doggie class which didn't go so well as she hid under the chair! I immediately ordered these again and made sure she wore it to her next class. It was literally like a different dog. No hiding, she was responsive and did so well. For our girl they truly help. She is much more relaxed when she wears this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Elia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Noticable change in dogs behavior.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. He has been wearing them for 4 months now and his behavior has changed. He loves wearing them, whenever he gets a bath he waits for me to put it back on him. He hasn't had an accident or marked the house in the 4 months. His barking has decreased as well as his destruction. They do have a strong but pleasant smell. I have not had any short or odd length collars like others have reported.
customer_reviews.author: VioletHour94

customer_reviews.title: Broken Collar / Can't Return
customer_reviews.text: When I opened second collar, part of the buckle was missing so I could not use the collar. Since it was past 30 days since I purchased the 3 pack, I was not able to get a refund or a replacement. Thankfully I had one more collar, since there is a severe thunderstorm coming through tonight. I do feel that the collar does at least take the edge off of my dog's anxieties during storms and fireworks. If it wasn't for the one collar missing part of the buckle, I would probably have given it a rating of a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel60

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for my pom
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it did not help to calm my pom. He has suddenly become psycho when I get into my remodelled shower. We tried it over a week. It came highly recommended by peers who had benefits immediately. Sad it did not help us hopefully will help you.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Jean

customer_reviews.title: Calms my hyper dog
customer_reviews.text: My pup is hyperactive, (beyond being very active), and has been hard to handle. This collar really helps calm him. He's only 10 months old, but with the help of this collar, and a raw diet, he is calm enough to respond to training, which is individual, aimed at teaching him focus and how to be calm in new situations. When the collar needs replacing, I can see a definite change in his behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Best calming collar
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calming collar I have tried. The collar smells a bit strong but I immediately noticed a change in my very high anxiety pup when I put it on her. Initially you have to dust off white powder but I was expecting that based on others reviews. Definitely would recommend to anyone who wants to go the natural route for their helping calm their pup.
customer_reviews.author: A Furgison

customer_reviews.title: calming for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My Cavalier King Charles Spaniel is getting antsy in his old age. He paces almost constantly. It drives me bonkers. I bought this calming collar and it works wonders on him. It lasts about a month. I can always tell when it is no longer working as he gets antsy again. So, time for a change.
customer_reviews.author: grandmab

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on separation anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My mom's rat terrier was extremely anxious after she passed away. The vet recommended these collars to try before using medication for the dog's anxiety. I was skeptical, but began to see a slow but definite improvement in the dog after a few days using the collar. She is pretty much back to herself now, so I will keep using the collar on her for awhile longer.
customer_reviews.author: JennW.

customer_reviews.title: Smell is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on 2 of my dogs and the smell is unbearable. It smells up the whole house. I'll be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Facemyer

customer_reviews.title: Not again!! Oops
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see that it made a difference with my 2 May work for others. Scent is not Lavendar, stinks sorry but you need to use real pure oils. The Lavender is safe for pets and the pure oule smells great and works. But others may love this. This was just my experience. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Cameron

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for our 12 lb terrier mix we rescued
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical since this product is so much cheaper than others on the market. It worked great for our 12 lb terrier mix we rescued. When we first got him he was marking everywhere, humping like crazy, digging, jumping on people, and overall being a crazy out of control dog. I noticed a difference after a week. It definitely helped him adjust to his new surroundings. Now he is totally potty trained and crate trained, and these collars made it much easier for all involved!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever!! I have spent hundreds of dollars on some many products, anti bark collars, pills, a trainer, dvds, books, etc... I saw this and thought I would give it a try and she hasn't barked in over 16 hours since I put it on her last night. Best thing it's not expensive and it works!!!! My ears and my neighbors are in heaven!! So happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Monterio

customer_reviews.title: Try if you want
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother wasting your money on this... They make products to help with your pet to “calm” them down. But it doesn’t do anything. The scent is suppose to relax them, but from experience it doesn’t work. I tested it out for 2 months and seen no changes in my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue dog has anxiety issues around loud noises. We have tried many things. Thought we'd give this a whirl. It seems to help with some noises (commercial airplanes) but doesn't work with really loud noises like navy jets over our house or fireworks. Wilson doesn't seem to mind the collar or the smell. I think it's a good "low tech" alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Paula B. Shafransky

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have a hyper schnauzer/terrier mix...it does help her stay calm and sleep thru the nite and I have a rescue lab mix who has been thru hell and back...within 24 hours he his anxiety calmed down
customer_reviews.author: Tina wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Well made Collar
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I don't see much difference in my dog with this collar on. At first, the scent on it is very strong, and hard to get used to. I guess I was looking for a miracle, and didn't get one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Recore

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming toxic odor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar item from my vet upon his recommendation. I decided to try this brand because it was less expensive. The smell of this collar is overwhelmingly toxic. The one from my vet had no odor but this one is perfume scented and gave me a headache-I can’t imagine how my poor dog must have felt with it on. It can’t possibly be good for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have a floral scent
customer_reviews.text: It works, but there's quite a strong smell (almost floral). It bothers me and, I assume, bothers our dog. Wish they could do away with the scent. Other pheromone collars don't have it, so I assume it's added to cover up the pheromone scent for us humans. I'd prefer an unscented version. Felt bad forcing our dog to have this inches from his nose 24/7. It's too bad, because otherwise the product works and calms our senior dog. Three stars only for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Starting using these about a year ago when my 13 year old Schnoodle started getting old dog anxiety, pacing etc. work very well to calm him. My local pet store stopped handing these. Glad I found them. Price is right also.
customer_reviews.author: Mattski

customer_reviews.title: The good, the bad, and the ugly...and he's old
customer_reviews.text: So, at first I thought this collar did nothing. The bad: The anxiety never went away, the constant under-foot and following didn't stop, the stalking of younger sister continued to everyone's annoyance, licking every piece of furniture till it's soaked. The good: He slept more deeply and through the night. The ugly: We took the collar off after it ran out of scent, thinking it did nothing. And that's when everything went wrong. The stalking became murderous, the peeing became solid, under foot became bite your foot off, etc. So, even if you don't see immediate or strong results, it's still doing something. I will never take it off again!
customer_reviews.author: Ninosca9

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: My husky mix has separation anxiety. This was our last hope to avoid prescription medication because nothing else worked (treats, diffusers, shirts, etc.). It took a few days to fully kick in, but he is no longer destructive when left alone thanks to these collars. We have been using them 4 months now and couldn't imagine going back to life without them. They make everyone in the family much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J.

customer_reviews.title: Calming collar
customer_reviews.text: We love this collar. Our little yorkie got night terrors every night. We used Quiet Moments and it has improved the frequency of the night terrors. Since we added the calming collar she has not had an episode for a few days now. Will report in about a month again.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Foz

customer_reviews.title: Already noticed a difference
customer_reviews.text: We put it on our dog and within hours noticed a difference. She usually barks and lunges on walks when she sees people, but on the walks after putting on this collar the most she'd do is growl a bit and after a few seconds seem to forget about seeing another person. It's only been a day, so we can't know how it'll go over time, but I'll update my review after a few weeks. So far I'm impressed and hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Rescue dog calmer
customer_reviews.text: It didn't calm him 100% but it calmed him beyond my expectations so I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: William Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 year old, puppy mill mama rescue toy poodle. Very anxious and with major trust issues. This collar has helped her tremendously. She seems overall more relaxed. Approximately 2 weeks after wearing this collar, my dog started allowing us to pick her up, carry and pet her. She also started allowing my daughter to pet her, which was huge!! We are on the second collar, and I will continue to buy these. Significantly cheaper on Amazon, as my local pet store sells the 3-pack for around $40.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Aroma too pungent to keep on my dog
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say anything about the effectiveness of this collar because I couldnt keep it on my dog long enough for it to show any effect. The "Lavender chamomile fragrance" was so strong and unpleasant that I couldnt stand it. I know what lavender smells like, and I know what chamomile smells like. This didnt smell like either. It had a powerful chemical scent. I felt bad for my dog knowing how much more pungent it had to seem to him. I kept it on him for 2 days, but I found myself trying to distance myself from the dog any way I could.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Richardson

customer_reviews.title: hyper dog
customer_reviews.text: This product does not do anything to calm my dog. It's like using nothing. I'm very disappointed in this product and a very waste of money once again. I've tried everything to use to calm her. Nothing works!!
customer_reviews.author: Reena Scott

customer_reviews.title: Tired of THIS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered DOG calming collars received CAT calming collars. Not worth the effort to send back. Threw out. Tired of this crap. Tired of wrong item broken item late item etc etc etc
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to help with our dog's anxiety. I had purchased it for a specific event that we had coming up and the dog did much better with the adjustment than we had expected. Not sure if it was a direct effect from using the collar or if he just didn't react the way we had anticipated. I do like the smell of the collar, very pleasant. It is quite strong when first taken from the package, but he doesn't seem to mind and neither do I. The price was very affordable and that is the main reason we choose this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

customer_reviews.title: Sentry calming collar
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a 2 year old yorkie a few months ago who is very hyper. With everything I read I thought this would be great product to try, I've spent a small fortune on trying new things. He is only 4.6 pound so this collar was way to thick for his neck but I tried it anyway with no luck. I should of read it better the cat version would have been a better fit if it worked. He still jumps jumps jumps very hyper and outside thank goodness for the fenced in yard he is on high alert with every new sound. If anyone can suggest something I would greatly appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Shipton Potter

customer_reviews.title: The smell wasn't terrible, just not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: My dog went on a road trip with us and this did absolutely nothing to help him chill out. The smell wasn't terrible, just not my cup of tea. I don't know if a different dog would benefit from this collar but I know mine doesn't. My dog is particularity neurotic so it is possible a different dog with less neurosis would benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Spalding

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Rusty is a rescue dog and we ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Rusty is a rescue dog and we don't know what happened to him previously but he has been a challenge. This has help immensely. He is still afraid of storms and when the lights go out but his interaction with strangers has improved 100%. He was anxious in a car but now sits there looking out the window or just lays down. Trips to get his nails clipped were an adventure but the last time he was an angel; just shook for a few minutes when she started but then settled down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty's mom

customer_reviews.title: It works very well, but...
customer_reviews.text: These were half the price we were paying for the Adaptil & DAP brand products, yet the result is the same for our dogs. They work very well. I will DEFINITELY be reordering them. They work very well - my boy dog is still not peeing in the house anymore, which is great. I'm very happy. BUT, beware when you first open the collar packet. I recommend opening it outside. It was a horrendous mess! White powdery stuff went EVERYWHERE. I wiped it off over the sink lightly with a barely-dampened paper towel to remove the majority of the lose powder, which helped it not get all over my house. Other than that, it's a superb product!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: No need for medicine now!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorki was having a lot of anxiety issues to the point the bet wanted to put him on medication. We thought we would give these a shot and sure enough they worked as described. There is no smell or residue from the colors and the color doesn’t seem to bother our dog when he is wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Paso Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These smell nice. Strange but it's better then dog smell. My dog seems to like it. He does calm down a little when he has it on. If I take it off sometimes he goes and gets it and tries to put it on. Works on my 50lb dog as a mood changer, not a miracle for ill trained dog.
customer_reviews.author: layah

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this type of collar for my jack russell. He started scratching not long after I put it on him, then later that day it kept getting worse and he kept biting his tail and other areas all over his body. I took it off, gave him a bath in mild doggie shampoo and 1/2 of a benadryl. That helped some, and by the next morning he was fine. I don't know what else is in these that would give him that reaction, but something did. I chose three stars because although it didn't work at all, it was not necessarily the fault of the pheromone. It may have worked if it hadn't been for the allergy.
customer_reviews.author: MLouise

customer_reviews.title: Works well for minor behavioral issues
customer_reviews.text: Works well for minor behavioral issues. In combination with medication and training, it helped my anxious dog calm down and relax. Most of his problem behaviors have gone away with this trio. I was still having some issues before adding this collar, after only 2 months I have seen greater improvement than the previous 6 months of medication and training alone.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dawn Collins

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! and it smells good
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! and it smells good : ) I use the collar for my Yorkie when I have people coming over, in the car, staying some place new. it calms him but doesn't make him "out of it" i do notice that it doesn't work right away but it does work. I like to put it on him a couple of hours before whatever it is we are doing or if i know we are traveling i always put it on him a couple of days before. It says you can leave it on for 30 days but i haven't done that before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace, FINALLY.
customer_reviews.text: It's only been 24 hours, but there is an AMAZING difference. My 10 yr old female yorkie was 0% happy about our family's new addition - a 3 month old female Australian Shepherd. Up until now, it's been a 7 month, Yorkie-fueled territorial war of epic proportions: full of growls, teeth bearing, and the occasional attack. I decided not to cut the collar to length since I figured the old lady need as big a dose as possible, and wow! Just wow. What a 180 degree change. I was expecting absolutely nothing, and here they are now, tolerating each other's general existence. 10/10 will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing in calming my senior Maltese down during firework season as well as when we entertain at the house! I'm really grateful for these products and hope they're never discontinued!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my high strung sheltie, who stress whines a lot. Work great for him, and I always know when the scent runs out because it starts right back up again. I’m going to try them on my Great Pyrenees puppy we just got who’s scared of loud noises and chews shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me, uh, My Dog
customer_reviews.text: We tried this for our Great Dane who is afraid of thunder. We previously used a different, more expensive brand, with little result. Our dog now seems much more relaxed, plus she smells good. I commented to my wife that the dog smell reminds me of babies and she explained the "mother dog" pheromone of this collar so apparently it works on humans too. :-) I'm reordering a three-pack after buying only one to test it. Try one if your dog exhibits stress behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Kailua Steve

customer_reviews.title: You might want to try it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a friend recommended it from using it on his dog, obviously every dog is different but I figured it was worth a try. I tried this on both my dogs in the hopes that it would assist in calming them but we saw no difference after repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work at first
customer_reviews.text: The calming collar had a very strong scent at first, but was easier to tolerate after a couple of days. I was very surprised at how well it seemed to work, but then it only lasted for about 3 weeks. The second collar did not seem as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Us
customer_reviews.text: While I am giving this one star, I wouldn't say that I hate it, it just didn't work for us. We had previously used the drops on the bed of our German Sheppard puppy at night and they work great but went fast. So, we thought the collar might help with less work involved. Didn't really work at all. In fact, she managed to get it off and chewed it up (like she does everything).
customer_reviews.author: Freedom V.

product_meta.title: Sentry Calming Collar for Dogs
product_meta.description: Size:3-PackSENTRY Calming Collars use patented GOOD Behavior pheromone technology. Using a pheromone that mimics the one mother dogs produce to calm their puppies, the collars are clinically proven to reduce or eliminate stress-related behavior such as inappropriate marking, excessive barking and chewing. Collars help alleviate problem behaviors triggered by travel, thunderstorms, fireworks, being left alone and new social situations. This collar continues to release calming pheromones for your dog for 30 days. It can be used for dogs of all ages and breeds without long-term side effects
feature_bullets: CALMING COLLAR FOR DOGS: SENTRY Calming Collars contain a pheromone that is scientifically proven to reduce fear of loud noises, bad behavior and barking.
HAPPIER LESS STRESSFUL LIVES: Dog calming collar helps to reduce your dog's stress-related behavior.
IMPROVED BEHAVIOR: Calming collar for dogs helps alleviate problem behaviors triggered by loud noises such as thunderstorms and fireworks.
30 DAY COLLAR: One calming collar continues to release the pheromone for your dog for up to 30 days to help dogs and puppies feel safe and secure.
SAFE AND EFFECTIVE: Calming collar can be used for dogs of all ages and breeds.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
